sentence.Network_en: The postilion cracked his whip, and they clattered away under the Feeble over swinging lamps.
sentence.Network_cn: 双手“叭”的一声挥动鞭子, 一行人就在头顶昏暗摇曳的路灯下蹄声得得地上路.

sentence.Network_en: Four men surrounded him, besides the postilion.
sentence.Network_cn: 除车夫以外的四个人把他围了起来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(P) ... postil 批注 postilion 左马驭者 postillion 左马驭者.
...人的生活，于是就雇了一辆马车，车夫之外，还有骑领梢马的驭手(postilion)，再加上两个穿号衣的跟班(footman in liveries)，站在 …
“线上微教学”之-Read After Me跟我读8... ... 7. carriage 四轮马车 8. postilion 左马御者 9. coachman 马车夫.
《傲慢与偏见》第四十七章 _新沪江英语网... ... extraction 抽出,取出,抽出物 postilion 左马御者;平顶女帽.

list.abs: the postilion whipped up the horses ;那向导鞭着马。
without such postilions as I had with me I should have remained stuck in the road .如果没有这样的车夫，我与我，我应该一直停留在路上。
the postilion whipped up the horses ;那向导鞭着马。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'forerunner acting as guide to the post-horse rider'): from French postillon, from Italian postiglione 'post-boy', from posta (see post)

means.word_mean: 1. someone who rides the near horse of a pair in order to guide the horses pulling a carriage (especially a carriage without a coachman)
